author: El Imparcial
title: El Papa necesita
text: El Papa Francisco ha sido hospitalizado este viernes a causa de una bronquitis. El Papa ha pasado "tranquilo" su primera noche en el hospital Gemelli de Roma, donde recibe tratamiento por una infección en las vías respiratorias. Si bien, por prescripción médica no pronunciará este domingo el Angelus ya que debe hacer "reposo absoluto", informa el Vaticano. El pontífice ha pasado una noche "tranquila" e incluso le ha bajado la leve fiebre que padecía, según fuentes vaticanas citadas por la televisión pública RAI y la agencia Ansa. Tras la publicación de ese primer parte, el portavoz vaticano, Matteo Bruni, afirmó que "está sereno, de humor bueno y ha leído algún periódico".

author: Ramadan Al Sherbini, Correspondent Follow us
title: Saudi Arabia: Robots boost worshippers’ Ramadan experience at Grand Mosque | Saudi – Gulf News
text:
Cairo: As part of efforts harnessing artificial intelligence to enrich worshippers’ experiences at Islam’s holiest site, Saudi authorities have introduced a set of guidance robots to serve the faithful in the current month of Ramadan.
The machines guide the faithful at the Grand Mosque about performing rites, and accessing fatwas or religious edicts with simultaneous interpretation in several languages.
The robots allow users to get online access to clerics to answer their queries.
Chief of the Presidency for Religious Affairs at the Holy Mosque and the Prophet’s Mosque Abdulrahman Al Sudais stressed the importance of making use of advanced technology to disseminate modern Islam. “Utilising digital and electronic apps and artificial intelligence to enrich the worshippers’ experience is a mainstay of the presidency’s plan for the holy month of Ramadan to impart the message of moderate Islam to the world in several languages and facilitate guidance presentation,” the cleric said.
The service is available in 11 languages including Arabic, English, French, Russian, Persian, Turkish, Urdu, Chinese and Bengali. The robot features a 21-inch touch screen.
The lunar month, which started this year in Saudi Arabia on March 11, usually marks the peak season of Umrah or minor pilgrimage at the Grand Mosque in the Saudi city of Mecca.
This year is no different. Hundreds of thousands from inside and outside the kingdom have been flocking to the sprawling mosque for performing Umrah and offering prayers since the onset of Ramadan.
Saudi authorities have introduced several measures to cope with the influx of worshippers into the Grand Mosque in Ramadan and help them perform rites smoothly and comfortably.
They include allocating the circumambulation courtyard around the Holy Kaaba at the Grand Mosque and the ground floor for Umrah pilgrims.
Furthermore, certain gates of the sprawling mosque are designated for pilgrims’ entry and exit to stave off overcrowding.

author: @CiberCuba
title: Cubana de Miami detida pela segunda vez por administrar uma casa de recuperação cirúrgica sem licença
text:
Vídeos relacionados:
Por segunda vez em menos de dois anos, uma cubana de Miami foi detida por administrar uma casa de recuperação cirúrgica que operava sem licença.
Mónica Beatriz García e sua filha Laura García, de 24 anos, estão sob prisão acusadas de operar sem autorização uma residência dedicada à convalescença de pacientes submetidas a cirurgias estéticas.
"Esses centros estão operando sem licença atribuída pelo estado da Flórida e, além disso, muitas dessas pessoas que estão trabalhando nesses estabelecimentos não possuem o treinamento e a certificação adequados para o cuidado de um paciente, como poderia ter um médico ou um enfermeiro", disse a Telemundo 51 Ángel Rodríguez, porta-voz do Escritório do Xerife de Miami-Dade.
O detetive lembrou que García foi presa em 2023 pelos mesmos crimes que enfrenta nesta ocasião.
Segundo a Polícia, a empresária oferecia serviços a pacientes recém-operados por um preço de centenas de dólares diários, sem ter licença. Ela também descartava resíduos médicos, como batas ensanguentadas, sem utilizar um contêiner de risco biológico.
"É um tipo de pesquisa muito complicada e bem complexa porque estamos analisando as questões legais, mas, mais importante, a saúde e o bem-estar dos pacientes que estão nesses tipos de centros", destacou Rodríguez.
Situado no sudoeste de Miami-Dade, o negócio se chama Oasis Retreat Miami e oferece estadias por 2.600 dólares por semana, de acordo com as informações em suas redes.
Mónica Beatriz García foi detida em 2023 por operar ilegalmente pelo menos três centros de recuperação de cirurgias estéticas em Miami-Dade que ofereciam hospedagem, serviços de enfermagem 24 horas e alimentação por 250 dólares a noite.
A Polícia descobriu que recolhia as pacientes em centros estéticos e as levava para as casas, onde vários funcionários cuidavam de banhá-las, vesti-las, alimentá-las e administrar os medicamentos às operadas.
Naquela ocasião, negou as acusações. Foi imposto a ela uma fiança de 21 mil dólares, mas nunca chegou a ser processada.
Arquivado em:

author: @le_parisien
title: Autriche : trois islamistes présumés arrêtés, sécurité antiterroriste renforcée pour Noël
text:
Autriche : trois islamistes présumés arrêtés, sécurité antiterroriste renforcée pour Noël
D’après le média Bild, les personnes arrêtées sont des Tadjiks soupçonnés d’avoir voulu perpétrer des attaques au nom de l’État islamique au Khorassan, branche locale de l’EI en Afghanistan. La police autrichienne a renforcé ses contrôles.
Trois personnes soupçonnées d’être impliquées
dans un réseau islamiste ont été arrêtées en Autriche, ont annoncé dimanche les autorités qui ont dit avoir renforcé la sécurité autour des églises et marchés de Noël en raison d’un « risque accru ».
« Intervenant sur un réseau islamiste », les autorités autrichiennes ont arrêté quatre personnes samedi, a indiqué le ministère de l’Intérieur. Un porte-parole du ministère a ensuite indiqué que parmi ces quatre, trois restaient détenues dans l’attente d’investigations complémentaires.
Citant « un risque accru », la police a par ailleurs renforcé les contrôles, notamment autour des églises, cérémonies religieuses et marchés de Noël à Vienne. « Il n’y a pas de menace immédiate d’attaque à Vienne », a néanmoins précisé le porte-parole de la police.
État islamique au Khorassan
Samedi, la police autrichienne avait indiqué dans un communiqué que «
des agents terroristes en Europe appellent à mener des attaques contre des évènements chrétiens, spécialement autour du 24 décembre ». Selon le site du quotidien allemand Bild samedi, des services de sécurité en Autriche, Allemagne et Espagne ont reçu des indications selon lesquelles un groupe islamiste voudrait commettre plusieurs attentats en Europe possiblement à la Saint-Sylvestre et à Noël.
Selon le journal, les cibles de ces attentats pourraient être des messes de Noël à Cologne, Vienne et Madrid. Il affirme également qu’une personne a été interpellée en Allemagne. D’après Bild, les personnes arrêtées sont des Tadjiks soupçonnés d’avoir voulu perpétrer des attaques au nom de l’État islamique au Khorassan (EI-K),
branche locale de l’EI en Afghanistan.
Des fouilles avec des chiens renifleurs ont été effectuées samedi soir par la police dans la cathédrale de Cologne, suite à un « avis de danger » émis pour la Saint-Sylvestre, mais que les autorités ont également pris en considération pour Noël. Rien de suspect n’a été découvert.
En juillet, une cellule d’islamistes présumés de l’EI-K avait été démantelée en Allemagne et aux Pays-Bas. Les personnes arrêtées en Allemagne étaient soupçonnées de vouloir commettre une attaque dans le pays.

author: John Bacon
title: North Korea's Kim preparing for war with US, steps up nuclear sector
text: North Korea's Kim Jong Un preparing for war − citing 'unprecedented' US behavior [John Bacon](https://www.usatoday.com/staff/2647588001/john-bacon/) - South Korea's spy agency said Thursday that North Korea was likely to carry out military provocations ahead of major elections in South Korea and the US. - North Korea's military industrial sector, nuclear weapons sector and civil defense sector were urged to "further accelerate the completion of preparations for this war." North Korean leader Kim Jong Un has ordered his nation's industrial and military sectors to prepare for war with the United States, citing "unprecedented" confrontational activity by the U.S. and its allies. Kim, speaking at a 2024 planning meeting Wednesday of his ruling Workers' Party, said an in-depth analysis indicated the "severe political and military situation" on the Korean peninsula had "reached its limit," the [state-run news agency reported](http://www.kcna.kp/kp/article/q/0b4aee5f2df47f0d1b5def72c5226103.kcmsf) Thursday. The news agency said the military-industrial sector, nuclear weapons sector and civil defense sector were urged to "further accelerate the completion of preparations for this war." Kim's statements continue a pattern of threatening rhetoric in recent months. They come less than two weeks after the White House "reaffirmed its unwavering commitment to provide extended deterrence" against Pyongyang and dismissed no military options − including nuclear. "Any nuclear attack by North Korea against the United States or its allies is unacceptable and will result in the end of the Kim regime," the [White House statement](https://www.whitehouse.gov/briefing-room/statements-releases/2023/12/16/joint-press-statement-on-nuclear-consultative-group-meeting/#:~:text=ROK%20and%20U.S.%20officials%20from,of%20U.S.%20capabilities%20including%20nuclear.) said, warning that any nuclear attack targeting South Korea would be "met with a swift, overwhelming, and decisive response." Last month, North Korea put a military spy satellite into orbit after two previous failed attempts. The U.S. and its allies consider the satellite a breach of United Nations Security Council resolutions. On Wednesday, Kim pledged to expand cooperative relations with "independent, anti-imperialist countries in preparation for the rapidly changing international political landscape." South Korea bracing for more provocations South Korea's spy agency said Thursday that Kim was likely to carry out military provocations ahead of major elections in South Korea and the United States in 2024. The National Intelligence Service cited North Korea's track record of staging provocations before general elections in South Korea. Kim also has recently reinstated key figures involved in high-profile provocations against Seoul, South Korea's [Yonhap News Agency](https://en.yna.co.kr/view/AEN20231228005200315?section=nk/nk) reported. South Korea’s President Yoon Suk Yeol on Thursday ordered troops not to wait for orders to retaliate in the event of an attack, saying the military "should smash the enemy's desire for provocations immediately," Yonhap reported. Is North Korea preparing for war? It's a 'real possibility' Harry Kazianis, senior director of National Security Affairs at the Center for the National Interest − a conservative, Washington-based public policy think tank − told USA TODAY he is concerned that war with North Korea could become a "real possibility." Pyongyang has been working on tactical nuclear weapons for years, and just testing them could spark a crisis with Washington and Seoul, Kazianis said. He added that North Korea could test an intercontinental ballistic missile by sending it thousands of miles into the Pacific Ocean to ensure its missiles can indeed reach the U.S. North Korea has bolstered ties with Russia Kim has strengthened ties with Russia in recent months, and he met with Russian President Vladimir Putin at the Vostochny Cosmodrome, a Russian spaceport, in September. Putin has been scrambling to arm his war against Ukraine, and last month U.S. authorities said Pyongyang had shipped more than 1,000 containers of military equipment and munitions to Russia. Kim knows US is tied up with 2024 elections Kim believes he can make his provocations and "never pay a price" because China and Russia are fully in the North Korean camp due to tensions with Washington, Kazianis said. "The Kim family also knows that in 2024 America will be looking inward toward its presidential election, giving them the room to cause chaos and feel no pain," he said.

author: Simon Dudle
title: Mehr Ferien für Lernende? Mehrere Jungpolitiker wehren sich dagegen
text:
STREITPUNKT
«Es wäre ein falsches Zeichen»: Warum sich mehrere Jungpolitiker gegen zusätzliche Ferienwochen für Lehrlinge aussprechen
Lernende fordern eine Erhöhung ihrer Ferien von fünf auf acht Wochen pro Jahr. Damit soll die Attraktivität der Berufsbildung gesteigert und der Stress besser abgebaut werden. Eine Umfrage bei Jungpolitikern in der Region Wil/Toggenburg zeigt aber: Es gibt Widerstand.

author: @infobae
title: Los famosos celebraron el reestreno de “Cuando Frank conoció a Carlitos” en el Teatro Astral - Infobae
text:
En la obra, Carlos Gardel le da consejos a Frank Sinatra y generan una relación de amistad El musical argentino Cuando Frank conoció a Carlitos , que representa el encuentro imaginario entre Carlos Gardel y Frank Sinatra en Nueva York, capturó la atención del público y de la crítica, al lograr 10 nominaciones a los Premios Hugo . En ese contexto, ningún famoso quiso quedarse afuera del reestreno de la obra que, desde el 12 de septiembre, se mudó al Teatro Astral .
Escrita por Raúl López Rossi y Gustavo Manuel González y producida por Héctor Cavallero , esta representación pone en escena a Oscar Lajad , en el papel de Gardel, y a Alan Madanes , como Sinatra. A través de este dúo, los autores exploran un encuentro entre dos íconos de la música popular mundial. La trama se desarrolla en un contexto de Nueva York en el que el joven Frank Sinatra aún no había alcanzado la fama que tendría años después.
El musical desborda de emociones y melancolía, con una evidente influencia del tango y toques de foxtrot y jazz, géneros que realzan la atmósfera de la época y la fantasía. Nancy Barbuto, interpretada por Antonella Misenti , también aparece en la obra, añadiendo un elemento romántico y dinámico a la historia. Gardel, con 43 años, ofrece a Sinatra, de 19, valiosos consejos, incentivándolo a participar en un concurso de talentos, lo que desencadena una serie de eventos con consecuencias históricas y trágicas.
A pesar de la vasta experiencia de Lajad interpretando a Gardel, el actor contó que para esta versión tuvo que reconstruir al personaje desde cero, basándose en testimonios de amigos y conocidos del famoso cantor. Porque a ese morocho que dominaba el mundo, a quien había visto en sus películas y cuyas interpretaciones había desmenuzado, hubo que moldearlo en la intimidad de un camarín, escapando de un amorío y lidiando con la irreverencia de un joven al que le entiende poco y nada. “ Lo construimos a partir de los testimonios que rescatamos. Lo que contaron sus amigos y la gente que lo conoció : lo divertido que era en las reuniones y lo buen amigo que era”, le dijo Lajad a Teleshow .
"Cuando Frank conoció a Carlitos" describe un encuentro imaginario entre Carlos Gardel y un joven Frank Sinatra Ese Carlitos por momentos se monta en la estrella y en otros baja al llano y se deja seducir por un adolescente que lo admira y lo escanea buscando cualquier detalle que lo ayude a moldear su personalidad artística. “ Fue una suerte hacer ese Sinatra que la gente conoce menos, porque me dio la libertad de construir sobre los bordes del personaje ”, cuenta Madanes, mientras palpita el estreno. “Me gusta investigar cada personaje, leí mucho y me empapé de su historia, sobre todo de sus comienzos y de esa pasión inicial por la música”, agregó.
La producción, según Héctor Cavallero, otorgó gran prioridad a la calidad de todos los aspectos del espectáculo: “El secreto en el espectáculo es, primero, tener mucha calidad de lo que se brinda al público. Otras de las razones del éxito es que se trata de una obra muy bien puesta, bien dirigida, con texto inteligente , con protagonistas de primera línea, bailarines increíbles y músicos en vivo”, declaró.
La obra también despertó el interés de la prensa especializada y es candidata a obtener varios reconocimientos a su labor. “ Tenemos 10 nominaciones a los Premios Hugo , estamos en un teatro precioso, vamos a ver si además de los Premios Hugo podemos tener algún Premio Tony”, expresó entre risas Cavallero.
Cuando Frank conoció a Carlitos está nominada a mejor musical, dirección general, libro de musical argentino, producción integral, actuación protagónica masculina, arreglos musicales, dirección musical, diseño de escenografía y mejor diseño de luces original, en una ceremonia que tendrá lugar el próximo martes 24 de septiembre .
Las fotos del reestreno Víctor Laplace y Héctor Cavallero (Fotos/RS Fotos) El periodista Enrique "Quique" Wolff Aníbal Pachano también dijo "Presente" Los periodistas Daniel Gómez Rinaldi y Valeria Schapira Silvina Chediek Luis Brandoni y Raúl Lavié Fotos/RS Fotos .

author: GB Times
title: Why am I being tagged in Facebook spam?
text:
Why Am I Being Tagged in Facebook Spam?
Facebook, the world’s largest social media platform, has become a breeding ground for spam. With over 2.7 billion monthly active users, it’s no surprise that scammers and spammers have taken advantage of the platform to spread their malicious content. One of the most frustrating experiences on Facebook is being tagged in spam posts. In this article, we’ll explore the reasons behind this phenomenon and provide some tips on how to minimize the occurrence of being tagged in Facebook spam.
Why Are You Being Tagged in Facebook Spam?
Before we dive into the reasons, let’s first understand what Facebook spam is. Facebook spam refers to unsolicited messages, posts, or content that are sent to you by others without your consent. This can include fake friend requests, suspicious links, and unwanted posts.
Here are some reasons why you might be being tagged in Facebook spam:
Friend Requests from Suspicious Profiles : If you’ve accepted friend requests from suspicious profiles or profiles that don’t look legitimate, you may be tagged in spam posts.
Public Posts with Tags : When you’re tagged in a public post, you may be exposed to spam content. Public posts are visible to everyone, including people you don’t know.
Scammers Targeting Your Friends : Scammers often target your friends and then tag you in their posts. If your friends are not careful, they may accidentally share spam content with you.
Fake News and Propaganda : Fake news and propaganda are becoming increasingly common on Facebook. These posts often aim to spread misinformation and may be tagged in spam posts.
Spammy Groups : Joining spammy groups or participating in conversations with suspicious individuals can increase the likelihood of being tagged in spam posts.
How to Minimize Being Tagged in Facebook Spam
To minimize being tagged in Facebook spam, follow these tips:
Be Cautious with Friend Requests : Be careful when accepting friend requests. Make sure the profile looks legitimate and you know the person before accepting the request.
Set Your Post Visibility to Friends : By default, Facebook posts are public. To reduce the risk of being tagged in spam posts, set your post visibility to "Friends" or "Only Me".
Block Suspicious Profiles : If you’re being tagged in spam posts from a suspicious profile, block the profile to prevent further spamming.
Report Spam Posts : If you’re tagged in a spam post, report it to Facebook immediately. This will help prevent others from seeing the post.
Use Facebook’s Built-in Features : Facebook has built-in features to help you manage spam. Use the "See First" feature to prioritize posts from friends and family, and the "Unfollow" feature to remove posts from pages you no longer want to see.
Common Types of Facebook Spam
Here are some common types of Facebook spam:
Type of Spam
Description
Fake Friend Requests
Unsolicited friend requests from suspicious profiles.
Public Posts with Tags
Public posts that tag you without your consent.
Spammy Groups
Groups that post spammy content or recruit members for malicious activities.
Phishing Scams
Scams that aim to steal your personal information or login credentials.
Fake News and Propaganda
Posts that spread misinformation or propaganda.
What Can You Do If You’re Already Being Tagged in Facebook Spam?
If you’re already being tagged in Facebook spam, here are some steps you can take:
Report the Post : Report the post to Facebook immediately to prevent others from seeing it.
Block the Profile : Block the profile that’s sending you spam posts.
Change Your Post Visibility : Change your post visibility to "Friends" or "Only Me" to reduce the risk of being tagged in spam posts.
Unfollow the Page : Unfollow the page that’s posting spam content.
Conclusion
Being tagged in Facebook spam can be frustrating and annoying. However, by understanding the reasons behind it and taking steps to minimize the occurrence, you can reduce the risk of being targeted by spammers. Remember to be cautious with friend requests, set your post visibility to friends, block suspicious profiles, and report spam posts. By following these tips, you can enjoy a safer and more secure Facebook experience.
